structure.unit: TRAFFIC REGULATIONS -- VEHICLE EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE

law.text: Any contract which purports to limit in any way the common law liability of the parking operator or his liability under KRS 189.700 to 189.720 shall be totally void and of no effect.
law.history: Created 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 154, sec. 5, effective June 17, 1954.
